summary: An engaging action-sport film, where a man avenges his sister's humiliation by participating in a deadly kung-fu tournament.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Karisma Kapoor|Ajit|Arjun|Gulshan Grover|Aruna Irani|Paresh Rawal|Ishrat Ali|Vikas Anand|Salim Khan Ding-Dong|Jamuna|Goga Kapoor|Koshrow Khalegpanah|Akram Khan|Hussain Khan|Shashi Kiran|Sukanya Kulkarni|Madhavi|Yunus Parvez|Asha Sharma|Yagnesh Shetty|Gurbachan Singh|Sudhir|Brijesh Tiwari
title: Jigar
